Class EmailSender

Direct Known Subclasses:
SmtpEmailSender
public abstract class EmailSender extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Flushable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Closeable
An email sender. Emails can be added with enqueue(Email) and they will be sent as soon as possible. Emails are not persisted, so if the process terminates, enqueued emails will be lost. The close() method will shut down the queue so that no further emails can be enqueued and then attempt to send any remaining emails before stopping. For testing purposes enableSending(boolean) can be called with false and emails will be processed but not actually sent to their destination.

SMTP is currently the only protocol supported. In the future, IMAP may be added when the need arises.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
